item.title: How do I add my Server IP to Client?
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

I couldn’t find anything ipserver/no-ip/.com related in my Client.java so I just stuck with chucking my IP into the GUI where it says:

		System.out.println("connecting to update server");
		Serverip = "crosspk.servegame.com";
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));
		initUI();

Because really that makes the most sense to me and I swear that’s how I used to do it, Anyway I’m uploading it now and it’s still saying “Invalid Server: Your Server Ip Here” But fingers crossed/in my ass. Hopefully it works.

Read full topic

item.source: How do I add my Server IP to Client?

item.title: How do I add my Server IP to Client?
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

[quote=“Jingojohn, post:2, topic:354945”]Go into client.java, and search for setserver.
Replace the old IP with localhost or just put it in the quotes if there isn’t another server IP.
Hope that helps.

The one you filled out is the wrong one, as mine is blank in the area.
That just has to do with the compiler. Do not mess with anything in that area except the text to the compiler which is above the serverip = “”[/quote]

Thanks for the help but it’s finding no results when I search “setserver”

I replaced all other IPs I could find with “localhost” but I’m still getting this…

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

I just really want to make sure others can connect before I upload my client and have people download it, ya know?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add my Server IP to Client?

item.title: How do I add my Server IP to Client?
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

Go into client.java, and search for setserver.
Replace the old IP with localhost or just put it in the quotes if there isn’t another server IP.
Hope that helps.

The one you filled out is the wrong one, as mine is blank in the area.
That just has to do with the compiler. Do not mess with anything in that area except the text to the compiler which is above the serverip = “”

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add my Server IP to Client?

item.title: How do I add my Server IP to Client?
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

Sorry for such a stupid question, Haven’t used a P Server since 07.
Also V sorry if for some reason this is posted in the wrong place.

I’ve just finished doing up my Client and now I can’t seem to find where to place my IP address.

I found this in the GUI:

		try {

		System.out.println("connecting to update server");
		Serverip = "crosspk.servegame.com";                       <--- [u]Added my IP in there[/u]
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
		initUI();

I think that’s what I’m suppose to do, Right?
However, It’s coming up in the cmd once I click “RunServer”:
Ïnvalid Server… Enter Server Ip :S

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add my Server IP to Client?
